item.title: Building SITERPADU Academic Information System for UNJANI
item.description: Introduction In the dynamic realm of modern academia, the effectiveness of administrative systems plays a pivotal role in shaping the quality of education and the overall student experience. Jenderal Achmad Yani University has embarked on a transformative journey by integrating SITERPADU, an innovative online academic administration system. Among its array of modules, the Graduation module stands out as a pinnacle of streamlined administrative processes, specifically tailored to address the complexities associated with student graduations.
